modules.description: Provides functions to create and manipulate signal-like values that track changes and emit patches instead of full replacements. Works with immutable data structures and supports efficient updates through patch application. Used to optimize rendering or state synchronization in reactive systems by applying only necessary changes.

The module provides operations for creating, transforming, and observing differential signals that track value changes over time, working with signals, events, and versioned data structures (`'a, 'da) t. It enables efficient change propagation through functions like `bind`, `l6`, and `lN`, supporting nested or list-based updates in systems requiring real-time state synchronization or event-driven workflows. Use cases include managing dynamic data dependencies and propagating incremental updates in reactive applications.
